data.name: AlterTableAddOneColumnMsSQl
data.value: ALTER TABLE [cat_currency] ADD [code] NVARCHAR(3) NOT NULL;

data.name: AlterTableAddOneColumnPgSQl
data.value: ALTER TABLE "cat_currency" ADD COLUMN "code" varchar(3) NOT NULL;

data.name: AlterTableAddTwoColumnsMsSQl
AlterTableAddTwoColumnsPgSQl
AlterTableChangeDataTypeOfColumnMsSQl
data.value: ALTER TABLE [cat_currency] ALTER COLUMN [rate] NVARCHAR(100) NULL;

data.name: AlterTableChangeDataTypeOfColumnPgSQl
data.value: ALTER TABLE "cat_currency" ALTER COLUMN "rate" varchar(100) NULL USING "rate"::varchar(100);

data.name: AlterTableDropOneColumnMsSQl
data.value: ALTER TABLE [cat_currency] DROP COLUMN [code];

data.name: AlterTableDropOneColumnPgSQl
data.value: ALTER TABLE "cat_currency" DROP COLUMN "code";

data.name: AlterTableDropTwoColumnsMsSQl
AlterTableDropTwoColumnsPgSQl
AlterTableRenameColumnMsSQl
data.value: EXEC sp_rename 'cat_currency.title', 'description', 'COLUMN';

data.name: AlterTableRenameColumnPgSQl
data.value: ALTER TABLE "cat_currency" RENAME COLUMN "title" TO "description";

data.name: CreateTableMetadataGroupMsSql
data.value: CREATE TABLE sys_metadata_groups ( uid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER PRIMARY KEY, parentuid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NULL, title NVARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, iconclass NVARCHAR(20) NULL, memo NVARCHAR(300) NULL, isstandard BIT NOT NULL );

data.name: CreateTableMetadataGroupPgSql
data.value: CREATE TABLE sys_metadata_groups ( uid UUID PRIMARY KEY, parentuid uuid NULL, title varchar(100) NOT NULL, iconclass varchar(20) NULL, memo varchar(300) NULL, isstandard boolean NOT NULL );

data.name: CreateTableMetaObjectKindMsSql
data.value: CREATE TABLE sys_meta_object_kinds ( uid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER PRIMARY KEY, title NVARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, name NVARCHAR(40) NOT NULL UNIQUE, prefix NVARCHAR(4) NOT NULL UNIQUE, storedata BIT NOT NULL, isreference BIT NOT NULL, isstandard BIT NOT NULL, version BIGINT NOT NULL, memo NVARCHAR(300) NULL, settingsstorage VARBINARY(MAX) NOT NULL );

data.name: CreateTableMetaObjectKindPgSql
data.value: CREATE TABLE sys_meta_object_kinds ( uid UUID PRIMARY KEY, title varchar(100) NOT NULL, name varchar(40) NOT NULL UNIQUE, prefix varchar(4) NOT NULL UNIQUE, storedata boolean NOT NULL, isreference boolean NOT NULL, isstandard boolean NOT NULL, version bigint NOT NULL, memo varchar(300) NULL, settingsstorage bytea NOT NULL );

data.name: CreateTableWithUniqueColumnMsSql
CreateTableWithUniqueColumnPgSql
DisplayCodeAndTitleMsSql
data.value: CONCAT([tableName].[code], ' - ', [tableName].[title]) AS text

data.name: DisplayCodeAndTitlePgSql
data.value: CONCAT("tableName"."code", ' - ', "tableName"."title") AS text

data.name: InsertAutoFillValuesMsSql
data.value: INSERT INTO [metadata_groups] ([uid], [parentuid]) VALUES (@uid, @parentuid);

data.name: InsertAutoFillValuesPgSql
data.value: INSERT INTO "metadata_groups" ("uid", "parentuid") VALUES (@uid, @parentuid);

data.name: InsertOneRowMsSql
data.value: INSERT INTO [metadata_groups] ([uid], [parentuid]) VALUES (@uid, @parentuid);

data.name: InsertOneRowPgSql
data.value: INSERT INTO "metadata_groups" ("uid", "parentuid") VALUES (@uid, @parentuid);

data.name: InsertReturnIdMsSql
data.value: INSERT INTO [cat_currency] ([name], [code], [title]) OUTPUT INSERTED.id VALUES (@name, @code, @title);

data.name: InsertReturnIdPgSql
data.value: INSERT INTO "cat_currency" ("name", "code", "title") VALUES (@name, @code, @title) RETURNING id;

data.name: SelectTopMsSql
data.value: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM [my_table];

data.name: SelectTopOrderByMsSql
SelectTopOrderByPgSql
data.value: SELECT * FROM "my_table" ORDER BY name desc LIMIT 1;

data.name: SelectTopPgSql
